column4: is it possible that Kostas problem is that permissions are wrong for   .ICEauthority and .dmrc files   ?
ls -l .ICEauthority .dmr     returns   ls: cannot access .ICEauthority: No such file or directory

Then why did he report to us an error message that says:  "Users $HOME/.dmrc is being ignored. This prevents the default session and language from being saved." Then I click OK and get another error message "Could not update ICEauthority file /home/kostas/.ICEauthority"?
